data.title: Movie Reviews, TV Reviews, Game Reviews, and Music Reviews
data.meta_description: Metacritic aggregates music, game, tv, and movie reviews from the leading critics. Only Metacritic.com uses METASCORES, which let you know at a glance how each item was reviewed.
data.text:
Jason Dietz

We rank every live-action film adapted from a video game—dating from 1993's Super Mario Bros. to this month's new Borderlands—from worst to best according to their Metascores.

Jason Dietz

Get details on the most notable TV shows debuting in August 2024, including the returns of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, Pachinko, and Only Murders in the Building.

Keith Kimbell

Get details on all of the notable films debuting in August, including the latest Alien sequel and a big-screen adaptation of the Borderlands video games.

Jason Dietz

We rank the highest-scoring new video games released during the first half of 2024.

Jason Dietz

Find a schedule of release dates for every movie coming to theaters, VOD, and streaming throughout 2024 and beyond, updated daily.

Jason Dietz

Find a list of new movie and TV releases on DVD and Blu-ray (updated weekly) as well as a calendar of upcoming releases on home video.

Jason Dietz

Find release dates and scores for every major upcoming and recent video game release for all platforms, updated weekly.

Jason Dietz

Find a frequently updated calendar of premiere dates for all upcoming new and returning television shows on broadcast, streaming, and cable, plus TV movies and specials and VOD releases.

Jason Dietz

We rank every live-action film adapted from a video game—dating from 1993's Super Mario Bros. to this month's new Borderlands—from worst to best according to their Metascores.

Jason Dietz

Our frequently updated list shows the latest free games available from Epic Games Store, IndieGala, Steam, Fanatical, GOG, and more as well as new and upcoming titles added to subscription services like Game Pass, PlayStation Plus, Prime Gaming, and Humble.

Jason Dietz

Get a list of the best movies and TV shows recently added (and coming soon) to the Peacock streaming service, updated frequently.

Jason Dietz

Get a list of the best movies and TV shows recently added (and coming soon) to Amazon's Prime Video, updated frequently.

Jason Dietz

Find a list of the best movies and TV shows recently added to Paramount+ and Paramount+ With Showtime, plus a list of titles coming soon to the streaming services.
